title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search
name: Field Search
description: New tabs are added to search results
author: Mario Pietsch
text:
{
    "tiddlers": {
        "$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/field-search": {
            "title": "$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/field-search",
            "caption": "Field-Search plugin",
            "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Settings",
            "text": "\define setDefault()
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/fieldWrapper"/>
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/aliasWrapper"/>
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/captionWrapper"/>
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/textWrapper"/>
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/titleWrapper"/>
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList"/>
\end

!! Field Search Settings

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/fieldWrapper" tag="$:/tags/SearchResults" checked="$:/tags/SearchResults" unchecked="" default="$:/tags/SearchResults"> Add "Fields Search" tab to the search dropdown!</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/aliasWrapper" tag="$:/tags/SearchResults" checked="$:/tags/SearchResults" unchecked="" default=""> Add "Alias Search" tab to the search dropdown!</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/captionWrapper" tag="$:/tags/SearchResults" checked="$:/tags/SearchResults" unchecked="" default=""> Add "Caption / Subtitle Search" tab to the search dropdown!</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/textWrapper" tag="$:/tags/SearchResults" checked="$:/tags/SearchResults" unchecked="" default=""> Add "Text only" tab to the search dropdown!</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/titleWrapper" tag="$:/tags/SearchResults" checked="$:/tags/SearchResults" unchecked="" default=""> Add "Title" tab to the search dropdown!</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList" tag="$:/tags/SearchResults" checked="$:/tags/SearchResults" unchecked="" default="$:/tags/SearchResults"> Add "Default Search" tab to the search dropdown!</$checkbox>

!! Tab Order

You can use drag&drop to sort the list:

><<list-tagged-draggable tag:"$:/tags/SearchResults">>

!! Return to Default

The following shaddow tiddlers have been modified: 

<<list-links filter:"[tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]is[tiddler]is[shadow]sort[title]]">>

<$button actions=<<setDefault>> >
Return to: Default Settings!
</$button>

"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/history": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/history",
            "text": "V 0.2.4 - 2020-12-25

* update license

V 0.2.3 - 2020.01.19

* Update license link/text

V 0.2.2 - 2019.02.27

* add "include system tiddlers" option per tab
* work with a single template instead of duplicated code
* Adjust minimum TW version to V5.1.18 because of "subfilter" usage

V 0.1.0 - 2019.02.19

* Make it more "update-friendly"
** wrappers are tagged instead of "search-list" tiddlers

V 0.0.1 - 2019.02.19

* Initial release
* Add "Field Search" tab to search results
* Basic configuration options
"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/icon": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/icon",
            "text": "<svg width="22pt" height="22pt" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 128 128">
<path transform="scale(4.36)" d="m18.6 0-14.5 7.33-3.93 14.7 10.5 7.33 14.5-7.33 3.93-14.7-10.5-7.33zm-5.84 4.81c2.22 0 4.16 1.21 5.2 3h0.34v0.00195c0.277-0.0114 0.548 0.0881 0.744 0.273l2.8 2.64c0.182 0.171 0.287 0.402 0.291 0.645h0.00391v10.5c0 0.516-0.443 0.936-0.99 0.936h-9.91c-0.547 0-0.99-0.419-0.99-0.936v-5.56c-0.285-0.132-0.561-0.282-0.82-0.455l-4.3 4.3c-0.462 0.462-1.21 0.462-1.67 0-0.462-0.462-0.462-1.21 0-1.67l4.3-4.3c-0.656-0.985-1.01-2.14-1-3.33 0-3.32 2.69-6.01 6.01-6.01zm0 1.6c-2.07 0.0138-4.32 1.67-4.32 4.41 0 1.57 0.662 2.9 1.81 3.67v-5.73c0-0.516 0.443-0.936 0.99-0.936h4.71c-0.873-0.893-2.07-1.41-3.19-1.41zm-1.14 2.82v5.83c0.358 0.0841 0.734 0.143 1.14 0.143 2.36 0 4.44-1.74 4.44-4.38 0-0.577-0.115-1.11-0.309-1.59h-5.27zm1.26 1.45h3.12c0.508 0 0.916 0.443 0.916 0.992v0.0273c0 0.549-0.408 0.99-0.916 0.99h-3.12c-0.508 0-0.918-0.441-0.918-0.99v-0.0273c0-0.549 0.41-0.992 0.918-0.992zm5.86 0.531c-0.2 3.14-2.8 5.62-5.99 5.62-0.391 0-0.77-0.0497-1.14-0.121v4.62h9.05v-9.94h-1.38c-0.204 0-0.382-0.0727-0.539-0.172z" style="stroke-width:.229"/>
</svg>"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/license": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/license",
            "text": "[[Field Search-Plugin|https://wikilabs.github.io/#field-search]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2019-2021

https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause
"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/readme": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/readme",
            "text": "This plugin adds a "Field Search" tab to the search results

{{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/field-search}}"
        },
        "title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/styles": {
            "title": "title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/styles",
            "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet",
            "text": ".wltc-show-system {
  float: right;
}

.wltc-show-system input {
  visibility: hidden;
  margin-left: -1em;
  width: initial;
}

.wltc-show-system  input[checked] + span{
  color: blue;
}"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/aliasWrapper": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/aliasWrapper",
            "caption": "Aliases",
            "search-set": "[has[aliases]!is[system]]",
            "search-sort": "[sort[title]limit[250]]",
            "opt-unchecked": "[has[aliases]!is[system]]",
            "opt-checked": "[has[aliases]]",
            "text": "\define searchTerm() [search:aliases{$(searchTiddler)$}]

{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/SearchResultTemplate}}"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/captionWrapper": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/captionWrapper",
            "caption": "Caption / Subtitle",
            "search-set": "[!is[system]]",
            "search-sort": "[sort[title]limit[250]]",
            "opt-unchecked": "[!is[system]]",
            "opt-checked": "[all[]]",
            "text": "\define searchTerm() [search:caption,subtitle{$(searchTiddler)$}]

{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/SearchResultTemplate}}"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/fieldWrapper": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/fieldWrapper",
            "tags": "$:/tags/SearchResults",
            "caption": "Fields",
            "search-set": "[!is[system]]",
            "search-sort": "[sort[title]limit[250]]",
            "opt-unchecked": "[!is[system]]",
            "opt-checked": "[all[]]",
            "text": "\define searchTerm() [search:-title,text{$(searchTiddler)$}]

{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/SearchResultTemplate}}"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/SearchResultTemplate": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/SearchResultTemplate",
            "text": "\define showAll()
<small><$checkbox field="search-set" checked={{!!opt-checked}} unchecked={{!!opt-unchecked}} class="wltc-show-system">+ system</$checkbox></small>
\end
<$tiddler tiddler=<<currentTab>>>
//<small>Search all ''{{!!caption}}'' fields </small> <<showAll>>//

<$list filter="[subfilter{!!search-set}] +[subfilter<searchTerm>] +[subfilter{!!search-sort}]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>

</$tiddler>"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/textWrapper": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/textWrapper",
            "caption": "Text",
            "search-set": "[!is[system]]",
            "search-sort": "[sort[title]limit[250]]",
            "opt-unchecked": "[!is[system]]",
            "opt-checked": "[all[]]",
            "text": "\define searchTerm() [search:text{$(searchTiddler)$}]

{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/SearchResultTemplate}}"
        },
        "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/titleWrapper": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/titleWrapper",
            "caption": "Title",
            "search-set": "[!is[system]]",
            "search-sort": "[sort[title]limit[250]]",
            "opt-unchecked": "[!is[system]]",
            "opt-checked": "[all[]]",
            "text": "\define searchTerm() [search:title{$(searchTiddler)$}]

{{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/SearchResultTemplate}}"
        }
    }
}
